name: baleen-plugins
description: Claude Code plugins collection by baleen

plugins.name: suggest-compacting
plugins.description: Automatically suggests when to manually compact context during long sessions

plugins.name: auto-updater
plugins.description: Automatic plugin installation and updates from baleen-plugins marketplace

plugins.name: git-guard
plugins.description: Git workflow protection hooks - prevents commit and PR bypasses, enforces pre-commit checks

plugins.name: lsp-bash
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for Bash - bash-language-server

plugins.name: lsp-typescript
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for TypeScript and JavaScript - typescript-language-server

plugins.name: lsp-python
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for Python - pyright

plugins.name: lsp-go
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for Go - gopls

plugins.name: lsp-kotlin
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for Kotlin - kotlin-language-server

plugins.name: lsp-lua
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for Lua - lua-language-server

plugins.name: lsp-nix
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for Nix - nil

plugins.name: me
plugins.description: Personal Claude Code configuration - TDD, systematic debugging, git workflow, code review, development automation

plugins.name: notify-user-input
plugins.description: macOS desktop notifications when Claude Code asks for user input

plugins.name: ralph-loop
plugins.description: Continuous self-referential AI loops for interactive iterative development, implementing the Ralph Wiggum technique

plugins.name: handoff
plugins.description: Session handoff plugin for Claude Code - save and restore session context between sessions

plugins.name: databricks-devtools
plugins.description: Databricks CLI wrapper for workspace management and SQL execution

plugins.name: conversation-memory
plugins.description: Persistent semantic memory for Claude Code conversations - search, index, and retrieve past sessions using embeddings
